body: My dude's art is too fucking good.

How is this NTR and is how is Datsu-San a cuck? I have played SRW V over 20 times (I Love Cross Ange e.g. the characters, the mechs and the music and Chitose is my waifu and played it on multiple accounts and on the PS4 and Vita for trophies lol) and Chitose is never in a relationship or shown any serious romantic feelings for anyone other than Nine who wasn't in the story at this point and she actually says at one point Soji is like a little brother, even though he is older than her. How Datsu-san is the last person I would have wanted to write as the love interest if I was the mangaka, but least he isn't the usual evil type of ugly bastard you normally see in these types of stories and was actually a really nice man in the game.
Seriously why isn't there anything with Nine or Lottie's fine ass?

Dont mind cuck stories as long as the art is good and story is not shitty.This one is art good(for the female) but the story is shitty.Didn't fap.
Kill All Old Bald Dilfs,Ugly Fat Cucks and Rape.

How anyone going to complain about tags when you can blacklist? I don’t like loli shit so I have that shit blacklisted so I don’t see it. Real sus of common faces that are apparently against ntr but show up every chance they get.
TheDoujinLover is a triggered cuck. Gas cucks.
